meanings.definition: A statement that denies responsibility or liability.
meanings.sent1: The disclaimers on the website protect the company from legal issues.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to read all the disclaimers before agreeing to the terms.
meanings.sent3: The disclaimers on the product label were so serious, they made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her constant disclaimers about not being responsible were like a shield against blame.
meanings.sent5: The bold red disclaimers caught my attention immediately.

meanings.definition: A clause in a legal document that limits or excludes liability.
meanings.sent1: The contract included a strict disclaimers clause to protect both parties.
meanings.sent2: It is important to understand the disclaimers in the agreement before signing.
meanings.sent3: The disclaimers in the contract seemed like a tricky puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: The disclaimers clause acted as a safety net in case of any disputes.
meanings.sent5: The lawyer emphasized the significance of the disclaimers in the document.

meanings.definition: A disclaimer of interest in property.
meanings.sent1: His disclaimers of any ownership in the land were clearly stated in the deed.
meanings.sent2: The legal document contained a detailed disclaimer regarding property rights.
meanings.sent3: The disclaimer of interest in the house made the real estate deal more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The disclaimer of property ownership was like a key to unlock the legal complexities.
meanings.sent5: The clear disclaimer of interest helped avoid any confusion about ownership.
